sentences.en: Almost 13 per cent of the working population is already unemployed.
sentences.cn: 就业人口中有将近13%已失业。

sentences.en: He had a staff of six salespeople working for him.
sentences.cn: 他手下有6名销售人员为他工作。

sentences.en: He started working for a gallery sweeping up and making the tea.
sentences.cn: 他开始在画廊做扫地沏茶的工作。

sentences.en: I avoid working in places which are too public.
sentences.cn: 我避免在过于抛头露面的地方工作。

sentences.en: I have been working on exploding the myth of fixity of meaning.
sentences.cn: 我一直在致力于推翻有关意义恒定性的谬谈。

sentences.en: I shall never understand the workings of his mind (= how he thinks ) .
sentences.cn: 我永远理解不了他的想法。

sentences.en: In a normal working day, I see around 6 or 7 clients.
sentences.cn: 一般每个工作日我会见大约六七个客户。

sentences.en: In working with others, you find out more about yourself.
sentences.cn: 在与别人一起工作的过程中，你会进一步认识你自己。

sentences.en: Industry has been working at developing harmless substitutes for these gases.
sentences.cn: 该行业一直在努力开发一些可以替代这些气体的无害物质。

sentences.en: It will be returned within three working days (= three days, not including weekends or public holidays ) .
sentences.cn: 将于三个工作日之内退还。

sentences.en: Many mothers prefer flexible working hours .
sentences.cn: 许多母亲更喜欢弹性工作时间。

sentences.en: Most of the people there are salt-of-the-earth, good, working-class people.
sentences.cn: 那里的大多数人都是吃苦耐劳、心地善良的工人阶级。

sentences.en: Rescuers were still working their way towards the trapped men.
sentences.cn: 营救人员仍在艰难地向被困者靠拢。

sentences.en: The majority of foreign nationals working here have work permits.
sentences.cn: 大多数在这里工作的外国人都有工作许可证。

sentences.en: They are open to suggestions on how working conditions might be improved.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意就如何改善工作条件听取各种意见。

sentences.en: They've been living and working peacefully with members of various ethnic groups.
sentences.cn: 他们和不同民族的人们一起和睦地生活和工作。

sentences.en: We do a 37-hour working week.
sentences.cn: 我们每周工作37小时。

sentences.en: We're usually working side by side with the men.
sentences.cn: 通常我们和男性一起并肩工作。

sentences.en: While I was working on my letter the telephone rang.
sentences.cn: 我正在写信，电话铃响了。

sentences.en: Working with Ford closely, I fell in love with the cinema.
sentences.cn: 与福特的密切合作开始令我爱上了电影。

words.tran_cn: 切实可行的；可经营的；能工作的
日常的，工作日的；平凡的
工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；工厂；文学、音乐或艺术作品
同事，工友；一起工作的人
做重活的人；驮马；重负荷机器
使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
工作；影响；受雇用（work的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 工人阶级；劳动阶级
工作环境；作业环境；工作环境温度
工作面；施工面；回采工祖
工作寿命，使用寿命；适用期
致力于；作用于；继续工作
规划（制定，作成，计算，算出）；前进式开采
工作压力；工坠力；使用压力

trans.tran_cn: （涉及）工作的，（人）有工作的，（时间）用于工作上的，（想法等）可作为基础的
trans.tran_en: a day of the week when most people work. In Britain and the US this is usually Monday to Friday
the way something such as a system, piece of equipment, or organization works

trans.tran_cn: （使）工作( work的现在分词)，（使）运作，运转，（使）产生效果
